newsitem.title: FRANCE: French business leaders see activity rise - BoF poll.
newsitem.headline: French business leaders see activity rise - BoF poll.

text.p: French business leaders surveyed in December noted an increase in industrial activity and expected a moderate rise in activity in coming months, the Bank of France said on Thursday.
"In the coming months most sectors should continue to grow at a moderate pace," it said in a statement.

"In December, according to company bosses surveyed by the Bank of France, industrial activity rose in all sectors except intermediate goods, where it remained stable," it said, adding that agri-food and consumer goods were "better oriented".
